Pre-Game Insights: Bafana Bafana captain Ronwen Williams expects Congo to fight back during their 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier at the 17,000-seater Stade Alphonse Massamba-Debat de Brazzaville.
Coach Hugo Broos shared Williams' sentiments and said they must put last weekâ€™s emphatic result behind them and treat this clash as a new match.
Williams said they must take control of the game very early to frustrate their hosts into making mistakes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa comprehensively thrashed Congo 5-0 in front of a bouncing Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium in Gqeberha on Friday.
Bafana will be without Lyle Foster, who has withdrawn from the squad with injury and has since returned to his club Burnley in England.

Others: Bafana Bafana will face Congo Brazzaville in their 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier at the Alphonse Massamba-Debat de Brazzaville on Tuesday (6pm).
The match will be played on a synthetic pitch.
